room_title: Escape room "Patient 42" by Locked Up - Mishawaka in South Bend
room_description:
The CDC has issued a mandatory quarantine due to an unknown virus that is spreading like wildfire among the population. There is a raising suspicion that the vaccine resides in the same facility that you and your team have been quarantined in...
Do you have what it takes to find the vaccine, and escape alive, before your time runs out?
